mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member ( member_id, member_img, member_nickname, member_password, member_email, member_phone, member_type ) VALUES ( #{member_id}, #{member_img}, #{member_nickname}, #{member_password}, #{member_email}, #{member_phone}, #{member_type} );
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET member_nickname = #{member_nickname}, member_password = #{member_password}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, member_img = #{member_img} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
